UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antifungal effect of CopA3 monomer peptide via membrane-active mechanism and stability to proteolysis of enantiomeric D-CopA3.
Literature.Author: Choi H, Hwang JS, Kim H, Lee DG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=5µM),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=5µM),Trichosporon beigelii KCTC 7707(MIC=5-10µM),Malassezia furfur KCTC 7744(MIC=20µM)
